verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֡ם <WH120> of man אֱמֹר֩ <WH559> say לִנְגִ֨יד <WH5057> unto the prince צֹ֜ר <WH6865> of Tyrus כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Because גָּבַ֤הּ <WH1361> [is] lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> Because thine heart וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and thou hast said אֵ֣ל <WH410> I [am] a God אָ֔נִי <WH589> in מוֹשַׁ֧ב <WH4186> [in] the seat אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God יָשַׁ֖בְתִּי <WH3427> I sit בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> in the midst יַמִּ֑ים <WH3220> of the seas וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you אָדָם֙ <WH120> yet thou [art] a man וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> and not אֵ֔ל <WH410> and not God וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> though thou set לִבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> thine heart כְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> as the heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold חָכָ֛ם <WH2450> Behold thou [art] wiser אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you [מִדָּנִאֵל כ] (מִדָּֽנִיאֵ֑ל <WH1840> Daniel ק) כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner סָת֖וּם <WH5640> there is no secret לֹ֥א <WH3808> is a עֲמָמֽוּךָ׃ <WH6004> that they can hide

בְּחָכְמָֽתְךָ֙ <WH2451> With thy wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH8394> and with thine understanding עָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> thou hast gotten לְּךָ֖ חָ֑יִל <WH2428> thee riches וַתַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> and hast gotten זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> and silver בְּאוֹצְרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH214> into thy treasures

בְּרֹ֧ב <WH7230> By thy great חָכְמָתְךָ֛ <WH2451> wisdom בִּרְכֻלָּתְךָ֖ <WH7404> [and] by thy traffick הִרְבִּ֣יתָ <WH7235> hast thou increased חֵילֶ֑ךָ <WH2428> thy riches וַיִּגְבַּ֥הּ <WH1361> is lifted up לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> and thine heart בְּחֵילֶֽךָ׃ <WH2428> because of thy riches ס

לָכֵ֕ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Because תִּתְּךָ֥ <WH5414> Because thou hast set אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> as the heart כְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> thine heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> Behold therefore I will bring עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> Against זָרִ֔ים <WH2114> strangers עָרִיצֵ֖י <WH6184> upon thee the terrible גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the nations וְהֵרִ֤יקוּ <WH7324> and they shall draw חַרְבוֹתָם֙ <WH2719> their swords עַל־ <WH5921> Against יְפִ֣י <WH3308> against the beauty חָכְמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH2451> of thy wisdom וְחִלְּל֖וּ <WH2490> and they shall defile יִפְעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3314> thy brightness

לַשַּׁ֖חַת <WH7845> to the pit יֽוֹרִד֑וּךָ <WH3381> They shall bring thee down וָמַ֛תָּה <WH4463> the deaths מְמוֹתֵ֥י <WH4191> and thou shalt die חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> of [them that are] slain בְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> of the seas

הֶאָמֹ֤ר <WH559> Wilt thou yet תֹּאמַר֙ <WH559> say אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> god אָ֔נִי <WH589> in לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הֹֽרְגֶ֑ךָ <WH2026> him that slayeth וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you אָדָ֛ם <WH120> man וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not אֵ֖ל <WH410> and no God בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> in the hand מְחַלְלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH2490> of him that slayeth

מוֹתֵ֧י <WH4194> the deaths עֲרֵלִ֛ים <WH6189> of the uncircumcised תָּמ֖וּת <WH4191> Thou shalt die בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand זָרִ֑ים <WH2114> of strangers כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man שָׂ֥א <WH5375> take up קִינָ֖ה <WH7015> a lamentation עַל־ <WH5921> over מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> upon the king צ֑וֹר <WH6865> of Tyrus וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <WH559> and say לּ֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> unto him Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD אַתָּה֙ <WH859> You חוֹתֵ֣ם <WH2856> Thou sealest up תָּכְנִ֔ית <WH8508> the sum מָלֵ֥א <WH4392> full חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> of wisdom וּכְלִ֥יל <WH3632> and perfect יֹֽפִי׃ <WH3308> in beauty

בְּעֵ֨דֶן <WH5731> Thou hast been in Eden גַּן־ <WH1588> the garden אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> of God הָיִ֗יתָ <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> Every אֶ֨בֶן <WH68> stone יְקָרָ֤ה <WH3368> every precious מְסֻכָתֶ֙ךָ֙ <WH4540> [was] thy covering אֹ֣דֶם <WH124> the sardius פִּטְדָ֞ה <WH6357> topaz וְיָהֲלֹ֗ם <WH3095> and the diamond תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <WH8658> the beryl שֹׁ֙הַם֙ <WH7718> the onyx וְיָ֣שְׁפֵ֔ה <WH3471> and the jasper סַפִּ֣יר <WH5601> the sapphire נֹ֔פֶךְ <WH5306> the emerald וּבָרְקַ֖ת <WH1304> and the carbuncle וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> and gold מְלֶ֨אכֶת <WH4399> the workmanship תֻּפֶּ֤יךָ <WH8596> of thy tabrets וּנְקָבֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5345> and of thy pipes בָּ֔ךְ בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in thee in the day הִבָּרַאֲךָ֖ <WH1254> that thou wast created כּוֹנָֽנוּ׃ <WH3559> was prepared

אַ֨תְּ־ <WH859> you כְּר֔וּב <WH3742> cherub מִמְשַׁ֖ח <WH4473> Thou [art] the anointed הַסּוֹכֵ֑ךְ <WH5526> that covereth וּנְתַתִּ֗יךָ <WH5414> and I have set בְּהַ֨ר <WH2022> mountain קֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> thee [so] thou wast upon the holy אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God הָיִ֔יתָ <WH1961> become בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> of the stones אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire הִתְהַלָּֽכְתָּ׃ <WH1980> thou hast walked up and down

תָּמִ֤ים <WH8549> Thou [wast] perfect אַתָּה֙ <WH859> in בִּדְרָכֶ֔יךָ <WH1870> in thy ways מִיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> from the day הִבָּֽרְאָ֑ךְ <WH1254> that thou wast created עַד־ <WH5704> Until נִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> was found עַוְלָ֖תָה <WH5766> till iniquity בָּֽךְ׃

בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> By the multitude רְכֻלָּתְךָ֗ <WH7404> of thy merchandise מָל֧וּ <WH4390> they have filled תוֹכְךָ֛ <WH8432> the midst חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> of thee with violence וַֽתֶּחֱטָ֑א <WH2398> and thou hast sinned וָאֶחַלֶּלְךָ֩ <WH2490> therefore I will cast thee as profane מֵהַ֨ר <WH2022> out of the mountain אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> of God וָֽאַבֶּדְךָ֙ <WH6> and I will destroy כְּר֣וּב <WH3742> cherub הַסֹּכֵ֔ךְ <WH5526> thee O covering מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> from the midst אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> of the stones אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire

גָּבַ֤הּ <WH1361> was lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> Thine heart בְּיָפְיֶ֔ךָ <WH3308> because of thy beauty שִׁחַ֥תָּ <WH7843> thou hast corrupted חָכְמָתְךָ֖ <WH2451> thy wisdom עַל־ <WH5921> by reason of יִפְעָתֶ֑ךָ <WH3314> thy brightness עַל־ <WH5921> reason אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> thee to the ground הִשְׁלַכְתִּ֗יךָ <WH7993> I will cast לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> thee before מְלָכִ֛ים <WH4428> kings נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> I will lay לְרַ֥אֲוָה <WH7200> that they may behold בָֽךְ׃

מֵרֹ֣ב <WH7230> by the multitude עֲוֹנֶ֗יךָ <WH5771> of thine iniquities בְּעֶ֙וֶל֙ <WH5766> by the iniquity רְכֻלָּ֣תְךָ֔ <WH7404> of thy traffick חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <WH2490> Thou hast defiled מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑יךָ <WH4720> thy sanctuaries וָֽאוֹצִא־ <WH3318> therefore will I bring forth אֵ֤שׁ <WH784> a fire מִתּֽוֹכְךָ֙ <WH8432> from the midst הִ֣יא <WH1931> It אֲכָלַ֔תְךָ <WH398> of thee it shall devour וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֤ <WH5414> thee and I will bring לְאֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH665> thee to ashes עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all רֹאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7200> of all them that behold

כָּל־ <WH3605> All יוֹדְעֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH3045> All they that know בָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> thee among the people שָׁמְמ֖וּ <WH8074> shall be astonished עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> and בַּלָּה֣וֹת <WH1091> at thee thou shalt be a terror הָיִ֔יתָ <WH1961> have become וְאֵינְךָ֖ <WH369> and never עַד־ <WH5704> against עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> alway פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thy face אֶל־ <WH413> toward צִיד֑וֹן <WH6721> against Zidon וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> and prophesy עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> And say כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> I am against צִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> Behold I [am] against thee O Zidon וְנִכְבַּדְתִּ֖י <WH3513> and I will be glorified בְּתוֹכֵ֑ךְ <WH8432> in the midst וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> of thee and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בַּעֲשׂ֥וֹתִי <WH6213> when I shall have executed בָ֛הּ שְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> judgments וְנִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <WH6942> in her and shall be sanctified בָֽהּ׃

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <WH7971> For I will send בָ֞הּ דֶּ֤בֶר <WH1698> into her pestilence וָדָם֙ <WH1818> and blood בְּח֣וּצוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH2351> into her streets וְנִפְלַ֤ל <WH5307> shall be judged חָלָל֙ <WH2491> and the wounded בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> in the midst בְּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> of her by the sword עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> upon מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> upon her on every side וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become ע֜וֹד <WH5750> more לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel סִלּ֤וֹן <WH5544> brier מַמְאִיר֙ <WH3992> And there shall be no more a pricking וְק֣וֹץ <WH6975> thorn מַכְאִ֔ב <WH3510> nor [any] grieving מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> any סְבִ֣יבֹתָ֔ם <WH5439> of all [that are] round about הַשָּׁאטִ֖ים <WH7590> them that despised אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> them and they shall know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> GOD בְּקַבְּצִ֣י ׀ <WH6908> When I shall have gathered אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> from the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom נָפֹ֣צוּ <WH6327> among whom they are scattered בָ֔ם וְנִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <WH6942> and shall be sanctified בָ֖ם לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in them in the sight הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen וְיָֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> then shall they dwell עַל־ <WH5921> in אַדְמָתָ֔ם <WH127> in their land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> that I have given לְעַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> to my servant לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וְיָשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> And they shall dwell עָלֶיהָ֮ <WH5921> and לָבֶטַח֒ <WH983> safely וּבָנ֤וּ <WH1129> therein and shall build בָתִּים֙ <WH1004> houses וְנָטְע֣וּ <WH5193> and plant כְרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> vineyards וְיָשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> yea they shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> with confidence בַּעֲשׂוֹתִ֣י <WH6213> when I have executed שְׁפָטִ֗ים <WH8201> judgments בְּכֹ֨ל <WH3605> all הַשָּׁאטִ֤ים <WH7590> upon all those that despise אֹתָם֙ <WH853> מִסְּבִ֣יבוֹתָ֔ם <WH5439> them round about וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> them and they shall know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God ס
